mapper.sql: udatabase.id, db_name, db_type,db_url,db_user, db_password, db_description, project_id,project_name, udatabase.create_time, udatabase.update_time

where 1=1
and id LIKE concat('%',#{data.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},'%')
and db_name LIKE concat('%',#{data.dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and db_type = #{data.dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and db_url LIKE concat('%',#{data.dbUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and db_user LIKE concat('%',#{data.dbUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and project_id LIKE concat('%',#{data.projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into udatabase (id, db_name, db_user, db_password, db_description, project_id, db_type,db_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dbUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now())

insert into udatabase
id,
db_name,
db_user,
db_password,
db_description,
project_id,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{dbDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update udatabase
db_name = #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_user = #{dbUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_password = #{dbPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_description = #{dbDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update udatabase set db_name = #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_user = #{dbUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_password = #{dbPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_description = #{dbDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
